creditline: Gift of Vanessa Laird and Timothy Raylor
description: beaded leather strip with four circular medallions, each with four arrowhead shapes in blue and red beads against a white beaded ground; strap has white beaded ground with five elements with vertical green beaded stripe with red and yellow crosses, blue and yellow beaded vertical lines, red zigzags and blue triangles; received mounted and framed in shallow shadow box
title: Sash
